title: L'age En Fleur = the Blossoming Years
brief_description:
This teen drama set in a ballet school in Nice deals with the personal rivalries between dancers for the part of Galatea as well as the love entanglements between dancers and teachers.

Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini ; writers, Odette Joyeux, Philippe Agostini, Juliette Saint Giniez, Janine Delpech ; photography, Andre Domage ; music, Jean Beriac, Guy Boulanger.
Cast: Marcelline Collard, Manuel Bonnet, Maina Gielgud, Attilio Labis.
